FuncDef: This command includes either the first two (1 and 2) queues or the first three (1, 2, and 3) queues into the HSMDA WRR scheduling loop policy. This command defines how many queues are members of the scheduling loop.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies which queues to include. 1-2 specifies that the first two (1 and 2) queues are included in the HSMDA WRR policy. 1-3 specifies that the first three (1, 2, and 3) queues are included in the HSMDA WRR policy. Values-1-2, 1-3.
